mapper.select: select bhi.aid aid, bhi.hot_search_order hot_search_order, bhi.hot_search_cover hot_search_cover, bhi.create_time create_time, bhi.ip_local ip_local, bv.title title, bv.video_coin video_coin, bv.video_danmaku video_danmaku, bv.video_favorite video_favorite, bv.video_like video_like, bv.video_reply video_reply, bv.video_share video_share, bv.video_view video_view, bv.video_desc video_desc, bv.duration duration, bv.pubdate_time pubdate_time, bv.ctime, bv.video_url video_url, bu.`name` name, bu.face from bilibili_hot_info bhi inner join bilibili_video bv on bhi.aid=bv.aid and bv.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} inner join bilibili_user bu on bhi.mid=bu.mid where bhi.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime};
